Product Preview

Keero — Calm Knowledge Sharing for Product Teams

Keero helps remote product teams turn scattered notes and decisions into a collective memory. Centralized updates, async rituals, and contextual handoffs keep everyone aligned without endless calls.

Request Early Access Explore Features
Snapshot

Weekly Rhythm in Keero

  • • Monday playback recorded asynchronously
  • • Mid-week focus check with lightweight reactions
  • • Friday learnings exported for leadership digest

12

Pilot Teams

28%

Less Sync Time

Launch window: Q1 2026

Why Keero

Knowledge that Keeps Moving Forward

Keero sits between docs, chat, and project trackers—making sure product decisions stay visible and actionable.

Contextual Briefings

Automate weekly briefings that highlight what changed, why decisions were made, and what needs attention.

  • • Connect product specs, tickets, and research
  • • Generate shareable snapshots for stakeholders
  • • Track decisions with inline commentary

Async Rituals

Replace status meetings with focused prompts, timeboxed responses, and automatic rollups.

  • • Lightweight prompts for squads and leaders
  • • Smart reminders for overdue updates
  • • Mood and confidence tracking across initiatives

Connected Outcomes

Surface learnings, metrics, and next bets from every iteration to keep the roadmap grounded.

  • • Link experiment results and research snippets
  • • Build a searchable library of insights
  • • Celebrate wins with automated spotlights

Secure Collaboration

Manage guests, fine-grained permissions, and export controls for regulated teams.

  • • SOC2-ready infrastructure baseline
  • • SSO and SCIM on growth-tier plans
  • • Audit trails and compliance-friendly logging

Workflows

Designed for Product R&D Loops

Keero pulls together insights across discovery, delivery, and launch. Highlight what to explore further or where experiments need a boost.

  • • Research insights connect directly to roadmap initiatives.
  • • Meeting notes sync back to the relevant squads instantly.
  • • Lightweight rituals keep leadership in the loop without micromanaging.

Sample Flow

Discovery → Decision → Delivery

1. Discovery Pulse

Researchers log new findings, tag personas, and assign confidence scores. Keero suggests related decisions.

2. Decision Canvas

PMs capture trade-offs, link specs, and request async approvals with reactions.

3. Delivery Digest

Engineering leads post progress snapshots, blockers, and need-to-knows for launch partners.

Voices

What early partners are saying

Tech Stack

  • • Real-time sync via Supabase + PostgreSQL
  • • Next.js edge functions for prompt responses
  • • Rich document editing with TipTap
  • • AI summaries powered by OpenAI GPT-4.1

Integrations

Connect the tools your squads already love

Keero keeps data flowing without duplicate work. Bring in updates from delivery tools and push highlights back to the rest of the company.

Linear

Sync project status, auto-link issues, and surface upcoming releases in weekly recaps.

Notion

Embed Keero briefings into docs or pull existing specs into a decision canvas in one click.

Slack

Deliver bite-sized summaries to stakeholder channels and gather reactions asynchronously.

Figma

Attach design prototypes to rituals, track reviews, and capture decision history inline.

Drop your email to join the early access list. We share monthly updates, design previews, and beta invitations.
